snippet: The choreographer Heidi Latsky has been selected as the first participant in a new short film series focusing on dance and choreography.
abstract: Choreographer Heidi Latsky is selected as first participant in Dance for Film on Location, short film series at Montclair State University in New Jersey focusing on dance and choreography.
lead_paragraph: The choreographer Heidi Latsky has been selected as the first participant in a new short film series focusing on dance and choreography.

headline.print_headline: Choreographer Named to Montclair State Project
headline.main: Choreographer Named to Montclair State Project
